rows.label: tlk4130012101_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh! Glad you came! Thanks to you,
the work is moving along. Thanks
for helping with the repairs!

rows.label: tlk4130012101_msg0002
rows.name:
By the way, about those Tirkin,
they're helping with guard duty
over at Rahim's place.

rows.label: tlk4130012101_msg0003
rows.name:
You gave them a good scolding and they
were feeling down, so I invited them.
They're a pretty reasonable bunch.
